section.p: A synonym for insurance indicating how much protection the insurance provides. This may mean either the dollar amount purchased or the type of loss covered.

ol.li:
Contains zero or more [0..*] qualifyingReason, where its type is Qualifying Reason
qualifyingReason.

Contains zero or one [0..1] meansTest, where its type is Means Test
meansTest.

Contains exactly one [1..1] employee, where its type is Employee
employee.

Contains zero or more [0..*] humanitarianCase, where its type is Humanitarian Case
humanitarianCase.

Contains zero or more [0..*] qualifyingReason, where its type is Qualifying Reason
qualifyingReason.

Contains zero or one [0..1] meansTest, where its type is Means Test
meansTest.

Contains exactly one [1..1] employee, where its type is Employee
employee.

Contains zero or more [0..*] humanitarianCase, where its type is Humanitarian Case
humanitarianCase.
